abstract: Meredith Whitney, the bank analyst who jumped to celebrity from obscurity by correctly predicting Citigroup’s dividend cut, is having less success divining stock market winners and losers, Bloomberg News reports.
snippet: Meredith Whitney, the bank analyst who jumped to celebrity from obscurity by correctly predicting Citigroup’s dividend cut, is having less success divining stock market winners and losers, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: Meredith Whitney, the bank analyst who jumped to celebrity from obscurity by correctly predicting Citigroup’s dividend cut, is having less success divining stock market winners and losers, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: Whitney’s Foresight Falters After Citi Prediction
